column1: International Development in the Americas MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe MSc in International Development in the Americas focuses on the study of economic development in Latin America and the Caribbean and it is designed to prepare a new generation of regional leaders in international development. The programme focuses on the challenges and opportunities that globalisation and democracy offer to developing countries in the Americas and their impact for sustainable and equitable economic development.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
